name: High Moon (Addy Valentine)
description:
VOTE FOR US HERE

Take on the responsibilities of the lone Lawman as he hunts outlaws by day, and pushes back the jellyfish swarms by night.

Features

  • Fast-paced, slashing action
  • Shooting alley gunplay
  • Handmade scaling pixelart
  • A samurai cowboy

Controls

  • Move - AD
  • Slash - K
  • Dash - L

  • Gun Mode - Hold Shift
  • Aim - Arrows
  • Fire - K

Also, play right from your browser in GXC!
